knimeNode.name: TogoWS: Keyword Search
knimeNode.shortDescription: Provides access to the TogoWS search REST service

intro.p: In essence, this provides access to most of the databases in widespread use today, including: uniprot, kegg, ncbi, ebi and other data sources. This node requires the user to select the available database (over ninety databases are currently available) and the search terms. The results are each hit ID (eg. accession) from the chosen database with can subsequently be downloaded by the TogoWS: Entry Reader node.

WARNING: the node gets data over the Internet and makes your search term public - be careful with the data you make available!
Provides access to the TogoWS databases using the REST and SOAP API's as described in the following publication:

Toshiaki Katayama, Mitsuteru Nakao, and Toshihisa Takagi TogoWS: integrated SOAP and REST APIs for interoperable bioinformatics Web services Nucl. Acids Res. (2010) 38(suppl 2): W706-W711 first published online May 14, 2010 doi:10.1093/nar/gkq386

ports.outPort: Matching database entries for the search terms
